extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 4 and registration in a PHIL Major or Medial Plan and (a minimum GPA of 2.60 in PHIL250 and PHIL257) and (6.0 units in PHIL).

basic.description: An examination of major issues in the philosophy of art. Possible topics include: the definition of art, art and the emotions, art and interpretation, art and the aesthetic, and the philosophy of particular artforms (i.e., literature, film).
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Topics in the Philosophy of Art
